Automaton Guardians are melee-based opponents created by the Cres, a Guardian of Guthix, to protect Guthix's chamber. They can be found in the central room of Guthix's Cave after the completion of The World Wakes, The Firemaker's Curse, the Ritual of the Mahjarrat, The Chosen Commander, The Branches of Darkmeyer, and The Void Stares Back. They require level 67 Slayer to be harmed and are known for their various mid-priced stackable drops and their very rare glove drop.

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Requirements Spawns Map
Guthix's Cave115None10Maplink

Getting there[edit | edit source]

  1. Use the "Guthix's shrine" teleport on the sixth-age circuit.
  2. Right-click the High Druid and select Teleport

Strategies[edit | edit source]

Main article: Automaton/Strategies

Players should be aware of the monster's special attack, which does a pulsing area of effect damage around the automaton at regular intervals, but roots the monster in place (note it can still perform regular auto attacks while the special is active). This can quickly do 1000+ damage if multiple pulses contact with the player.

Rare drop table[edit | edit source]

This monster has access to the rare drop table.
Luck-enhancing items are not required to access the table, but they will increase the chance of accessing the rare drop table and may also improve the loot received from it.

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 24 October 2022 (Update):
    • Fixed an issue that prevented automatons from dropping their unique gloves if they were using their special attack.
  • patch 2 April 2013 (Update):
    • Automatons can now be stunned.
  • patch 25 March 2013 (Update):
    • Players can no longer receive Cres's Automatons as a co-op slayer assignment if they do not have the requirements to fight them. A login check has been added to fix players who already have these as a task and cannot access them.
  • update 4 March 2013 (Update):
    • Added to game.
